QuestData.Title: Mikhail's Journal
QuestData.Description: From what you can gather, this journal was written by a denizen of Silverbrook named Mikhail.$B$BIt is written in some variant of the common human tongue. Perhaps you should bring this back to Conqueror Krenna.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring Mikhail's Journal to Conqueror Krenna in Conquest Hold.
QuestData.RewardText: Hah! Is this some sort of joke?$B$BI barely have any use for books I can actually understand.
